items.content:
Unlike Bitcoin, silver has no network effect.

The more it spikes, the faster it will fall.
The narrative will wear out quickly.
Supply response will be <  1 month from today.
Scrap metal first.

People will ask, why didn't I just buy Bitcoin?

items.content:
In March 2024 silver broke out from a 13-year cup & handle formation. 
March 2024 for gold is the same as December 2025 for Silver with only difference that silver's cup & handle formation is 45 years long. I can't even imagine how far silver goes over the next year or so...

items.content: A few static details on the #GSR, #gold-to-#silver ratio collapse since the last few shorts in April, with that insane spike to 108, the clearing of the July 2022 high, and the sudden, brutal, unstoppable reversal into today’s 57s: a staggering drop of almost 47% in 244 days.

items.content:
The wild 2025 ride of the #GSR, packed into under a minute. 
That epic April spike to ~108 had us swapping #gold for bargain #silver: fire sales don’t make you think twice. 

Then the crash hit and the moving average cloud brutally crushed every bounce. 
Truly historic.
